head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VAN COTT, MARJORIE PIERSON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VAN COTT, MARJORIE PIERSON

block.p: Van COTT-Marjorie Pierson. Of Bridgehampton, NY on Sept. 20, 2000 at age 90. Predeceased by her husband, Clifford Van Cott; sister Gwendolyn Griffing, and stepdaughter, Leona Allen. Survived by several step grandchildren. A memorial service at the Bridgehampton Presbyterian Church at a future date will be anounced. In lieu of flowers, please contact Brockett Funeral Home, Inc. at (631) 283-0822 for Mrs. Van Cott's requests.
